mapper.select: select PKID, BATCH_ID, VISIT_REMARK , CONTENT , CONVERT(varchar(19),CREATE_TIME,120) AS createTime, CREATE_BY from sctrans.T_TS_RETURN_VISIT_REGISTRATION where BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by CREATE_TIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TS_RETURN_VISIT_REGISTRATION ( BATCH_ID , VISIT_REMARK , CONTENT , CREATE_TIME , CREATE_BY ) values ( #{batchId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{visitRemark,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID})
